SUB_C01_GMCK_BOFO_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_GMCK_BOFO_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, what a peculiar creature! And yet,
I feel as if I've seen it somewhere before.
Maybe an exotic animal my father took in?
Or a pet kept by one of my friends?

SUB_C01_GMCK_BOFO_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_GMCK_BOFO_EMERALDRIDE_000_CUT_00.text:
Howdy, stranger!
Fancy seein' you again!

SUB_C01_GMCK_BOFO_TRADEDRUM_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_GMCK_BOFO_TRADEDRUM_000_CUT_000_.text:
A'yup! That there's a washin' machine,
all right. But what in the Sam Hill
is it doin' here of all places?

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_00.text: At last, I have regained my true form!

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Are you truly the Dismal King?
Also, it usually takes far longer
for children to grow to adulthood.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_02.text:
So you say. Yet at this point, I have reclaimed
but a fraction of my power. Now guard me well,
for I am still quite some way from returning
to my true and complete self.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_SIUGNAS_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Remind me again why we
take orders from you?

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh boy. Oooh boy. Is this what
it's like outside of the Kosmos? Please, Canker! Pinch my cellular wall
and wake me from this horrid nightmare!
I don't want to be alone here!

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, shuck my grits! It's Erytheia!
How ya doing there, hon? Did ya manage
to get rid of that durn Canker fella once
and for all?

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Foreign body detected! Oh, thank goodness!
Well, I have no use for Canker anymore.
Aaaaaand away you go!

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_ERYTHEIA_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Now let us sally forth together!
You and I will need to get used to
being in the same boat, as it were.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
I don't know. But there's a door, so I can
only assume the suspect went through it.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Feels like we've been through here before.
We were in a big ol' hurry, so I didn't take
in the scenery at the time, but gosh!
Ain't this somethin'?

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
There are so many doors...
Where could they all lead?

SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text: Is that door the way back?

SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Just gonna have to cross our fingers
and toes and hope to heck it is!

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.text:
It appears my premonition was correct.
Again, we find ourselves in a place
that cannot possibly exist.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Is this outer space? Wait, that dog don't hunt—
we can breathe. Maybe it's actually a Twilight
Area. You know, like one'a them science fiction
shows they show on the ol' black-and-white?

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.text:
The ones where people visit other dimensions?
Yes, that feels right. But if there are other worlds
beyond each of these many doors, how are we
to know which is the one we need?

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Just gotta put our faith in the power
of the triangle and hope for the best!

SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.text:
I'm glad we're able to see the doors now,
but I still can't shake the feelin' we're
being used by somebody.

SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.text:
I agree. For now, however, we've no choice but
to proceed through that door. If we are indeed
being used, I'll play along and attempt to learn
from whom to demand due payment.

SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.text:
You're a heckuva lot more practical
about this than I would've expected.

SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Everything in the world is an investment, and one
must be proactive about collecting on such things.
My father used to say that, and I think it holds
true in this situation.

SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.text:
Incidentally, Bonnie, did you believe what
that man said about the president having
betrayed him? I find myself most curious
about what he could have meant.

SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.text: Heck, everybody's got a bone to pick with the man in charge. But I suppose he was the one what sent us off to fight in the Green Hells—and also the one who ended the war, if I'm bein' fair.

SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_CUT_000.text:
A hero of the Channel War and a man who meets
crises head-on. I know the president's reputation,
but who is he really?

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Do you think it was right, letting them talk
us into that? We still haven't received our
orders from the section chief, after all.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Shoot, this whole thing smells funny as an
old boot. We'd best go report it to the Major.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_020.text:
By which you mean the section chief. Also,
though you continually insist on referring
to him by his rank, he was promoted to
Brigadier General before his retirement.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_030.text:
He's the Major to me, and he always will be.
Dang thing's carved too deep in my brain
to go changin' it now.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Fine, do whatever you like. Regardless,
we should report to him as soon
as we return to Capitol City.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_010.text:
Good. Let's report back
to the section chief.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_020.text:
You don't wanna try puttin'
'em together right here?

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_030.text: Hmm. If something unforeseen were to occur when we assemble this item, I suppose it would be better for it happen here...

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_040.text: See, that's what I was thinkin'! Ain't no need to expose the whole goldurn Union States to danger. 'Course, I hope nothin' happens, but it always does a gal good to be prepared for the worst.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_050.text:
But when section chief told us not to do risk our
lives, this is what he meant—and I don't want to
ignore a direct order from our section chief—
or Major Tristan Hernandez, if you prefer.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_080.text:
Fair enough. 'Sides, who's to say we'd
even be capable of doing it ourselves?
Guess now that that's decided, we ought
to hurry on back.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_090.text:
If you're that confident, I'll go along.
It'll be you and me to the end.

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_000_100.text: Thanks a heap for trustin' me!

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_010_000.text: Dangit! I can't figure this out!

SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_010_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_CUT_010_010.text:
Perhaps tackling this in Capitol City
is the right choice after all?

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
This is the Junction. Did you truly
think you could outwit me by
completing the ritgram here?

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Outwit ya? We don't even know who the heck
you are—and we sure didn't know ya'd show
the moment we finished the thing!

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
We wanted to avoid risks to others by solving it
here—and it seems that choice was the correct
one. Now tell us everything about yourself and
the president.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Very well—but let us keep this short.
Quisstatium has collaborators on a
great many worlds, a fact even you
should have figured out by now.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Sadly, it's difficult to keep allies in your world,
which is why recruiting your president is so
important. For though only a single individual,
each president's worth is immeasurable.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
But the current president now looks to sever
the long and fruitful relationship between
Quisstatium and the Union States.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Which is why you went and
branded him a traitor.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Not officially, though some of our members tried
to remove him via physical means. While we do
not endorse such measures, we felt it necessary
to educate your president about our group.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
So THAT'S why ya sent us runnin' all over
the place? You were usin' us as some sorta
ambassadors so the president would know
all the worlds were linked by Kuisstotiam.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
And yet you perceived that as a risk. Why?
Surely you believe in your hearts that the
worlds should be linked, no?

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
I got no problem with linkin' the worlds
together, but I DO I got a problem when
ya go forcin' it on people.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text: To say nothing of the fact that you attempted to remove the president! He is our leader— not some tool for you to utilize or dispose of whenever the mood or whim strikes.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Cyber
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text: What the two of you must understand is that we of Quisstatium are road builders. We construct links to every world... and there can be no exceptions!

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
I'm relieved to see the door is still here!
I worried defeating that man might cause
it to disappear also.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
Sure, it's here—but that don't mean
it's gonna lead back to Capitol City.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
We've always found our way back before.
I trust this time will be no different.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
I sure hope so, because I wanna get home and tell
everyone we're done! Also wouldn't mind shakin'
the president's hand and tellin' him how much I
appreciate his savin' the world and all.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
The president is a true hero—a man fighting
a secret war in a place no one knew existed.
I hope we have a chance to meet him.

SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_C01_EVNT_BOFO_LASTBATTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
Oh, we're gonna meet the feller, all right.
You and me, Formina? We did somethin' real
incredible here—and there ain't no way
we're gonna let folks forget it!
